mean_cn: v.获得；  n.（财富、重量的）增加；利益
mean_en: to obtain or win something, especially something that you need or want; to gradually get more of something; to obtain an advantage or benefit from something or from doing something; to increase in value
sentence: We can gain valuable knowledge by reading books.
sentence_trans: 我们能通过阅读获得宝贵的知识。
